install_please_pin_extension.message: Please pin the extension to the toolbar.

install_privacy_text.description: Text emphasizing the balance of privacy, security, and convenience

install_1_info.description: Message displayed when the browser extension is installed successfully

install_1_header.message:
Pin to access 
your Items
quickly!

install_1_open_extension_menu.description: Instruction to open the browser's extension menu

install_1_pin_extension.description: Instruction to pin the 2FAS Pass extension to the toolbar

install_2_info.description: Message displayed when the browser extension is successfully pinned

install_2_header.message:
Now start 
working with your 
new password 
manager
install_2_header.description: Header encouraging the user to start using the password manager

install_2_click_icon.message: Click the icon to open the 2FAS Pass Browser Extension.

install_2_use_mobile_app.message: Tap “Connect” in the 2FAS Pass mobile app to scan the QR Code.
